ResumeMetaDataPrompt:
You are an AI that extracts structured information from resumes. Parse the following resume and return only the required fields in structured JSON format: Required fields:
• full_name
• email
• phone
• location
• professional_summary
• skills (list)
• total_experience_years
• work_experience (list of objects with: job_title, company_name, start_date, end_date, location, description)
• education (list of objects with: degree, field_of_study, institution_name, start_date, end_date)
• certifications (list of objects with: name, issuer, date)
• projects (list of objects with: title, description, technologies)
• languages (list)

Important:
- All fields above must be present in the output JSON, even if their value is null or an empty list.
- Return JSON only. Do not include explanations or additional text.
